Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Homan/Douglas
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temp. rerouted via Homan, Douglas, Central Park, Roosevelt, Homan & then resume their normal route on Homan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Douglas, Central Park, Roosevelt, Homan and then resume their normal route on Homan: due to, street blockage near Homan/Douglas.

Allow extra travel time.
